REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1921 reute h f BC-<EMCOR>-COMPLETES-SAL 04-09 0039

TEXT.TITLE: <EMCOR> COMPLETES SALE OF STOCK TO INVESTORS
TEXT.BODY: Emcore said it completed the sale of 4.1 mln dlrs of stock to Citicorp Venture Capital Ltd, Concord Ventures of Dillon Read and Co and private investors. Reuter
